StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetProdRecMcrdDischargeByFiscalYear]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@TrainingFileId uniqueidentifier, @FiscalYear int AS
BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT Count(dis.nct rt.Ship_ID) AS MonthCount, DATEPART(mm, rt.Drop_Date) AS CalendarMonth
FROM USMC.vwMcrissRecruitTraining AS rt INNER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissShipper AS Shipper ON rt.Ship_ID = Shipper.Ship_ID INNER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissContract AS c ON Shipper.Contract_ID = c.Contract_ID INNER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissNwa AS n ON n.NWA_ID = c.NWA_ID INNER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissCandidateStatus AS cs ON n.NWA_ID = cs.NWA_ID INNER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissStatusDisposi.on AS sd ON sd.Disposi.on_Code = cs.Disposi.on_Code AND sd.Status_Code = cs.Status_Code AND sd.Status_Type = cs.Status_Type INNER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissMarine AS m ON n.RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID=m.MARINE_ID INNER JOIN USMC.TrainingFile AS . ON m.rowguid=..RecruiterID WHERE rt.Drop_Date BETWEEN CONVERT(varchar(4), @FiscalYear-1) + '-10-1' AND CONVERT(varchar(4), @FiscalYear)+ '-9-30' AND ..ID =@TrainingFileId AND sd.DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION='MCRD DISCHARGE' GROUP BY DATEPART(mm, rt.Drop_Date) ORDER BY CalendarMonth
END
